mapper.select: select count(id) from sys_user

select
from sys_user
and id in (${userIds})
and account_state = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}
or (1=2)

login_name,

sys_code,

mapper.select:
select
from sys_user u left join sys_label_relation r on r.rel_id = u.id
and r.obj_id = #{idParam} and r.rel_type in (${relType}) and r.status = 1

select count(u.id) from sys_user u left join sys_label_relation r on r.rel_id = u.id
and r.obj_id = #{idParam} and r.rel_type in (${relType}) and r.status = 1

select count(u.id) from sys_user u left join sys_label_relation r on r.obj_id = u.id
and r.rel_id = #{idParam} and r.rel_type = #{relType} and r.status = 1
select count(DISTINCT u.id) from sys_user u left join sys_user_role rr on rr.user_id = u.id left join sys_role r on r.id = rr.role_id
select id from sys_user where id = supplier_id and user_source = #{dataSource}

select
from sys_user u
inner join (SELECT rel_user_id FROM sys_user_relation rel, sys_user us where rel.user_id = us.id and rel.status=1
group by rel_user_id) r on r.rel_user_id = u.id where 1 = 1
left join (SELECT rel_user_id FROM sys_user_relation rel, sys_user us where rel.user_id = us.id and rel.status=1
group by rel_user_id) r on r.rel_user_id = u.id where r.rel_user_id is null
order by u.create_date desc order by ${page.orderByClause}
limit #{page.startIndex} , #{page.pageSize}

select count(u.id) from sys_user u
inner join (SELECT rel_user_id FROM sys_user_relation rel, sys_user us where rel.user_id = us.id and rel.status=1
group by rel_user_id) r on r.rel_user_id = u.id where 1 = 1
left join (SELECT rel_user_id FROM sys_user_relation rel, sys_user us where rel.user_id = us.id and rel.status=1
group by rel_user_id) r on r.rel_user_id = u.id where r.rel_user_id is null

select count(z.id) from ( select u.id from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role rr on rr.user_id = u.id inner join sys_role r on r.id = rr.role_id
inner join p on p.supplier_id = u.id
and u.name like #{bParam.searchRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
group by u.id ) z
